alert.note: Alert for Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 29 at 9:09AM EST until January 30 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Western Greenbrier County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Advisory is issued when strong winds will combine with cold temperatures for several hours to create dangerously cold conditions for exposed skin. Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
